subject: PROTEIN
description:
Returns a given Property Type for: 
  -<cmd>length</cmd>: Retrieves the number of residues of a protein.
  -<cmd>boman_index</cmd>: Computes the Boman index of a protein (sum of solubility values of all residues).
  -<cmd>aliphaticity</cmd>: Computes the aliphatic index of a protein. Measure of thermal stability.
  -<cmd>hydrophobicity</cmd>: Computes the hydrophobicity of a protein, relative freq. of **A,C,F,I,L,M & V**.
  -<cmd>aromaticity</cmd>: Computes aromaticity of the protein (relative frequency of Phe+Trp+Tyr).
  -<cmd>instability</cmd>: Calculates the protein instability.
